content: this section with the rs facing the left shoulder is picked up from the back co edge with new mc yarn and main needles pick up and k24 24 26 26 30 30 30 32 32 sts along the co edge from the right side from m1 to shoulder edge purl 1 r work as follows r1 k to end r2 p to end repeat r1-2 for a total of 16 20 20 24 24 28 28 28 28 row worked next r is rs remove all stitch markers don t break the yarn as the next step follows from here yoke joining both shoulders and the back on the same circular needle while at the same time stitches are picked up and knitted along the sides of the shoulders with the working mc yarn and four stitch markers are placed on the needles start by moving all the resting sts onto one main size circular needles so they are ready to be worked be sure to check that the two shoulders and back line up with the right side facing the same way when joined work as follows from the rs starting on the left shoulder r1 k across left shoulder pm pick up and k12 14 14 16 18 20 20 20 20 sts from the rs along the side of the left shoulder pick up approximately 2 out of every 3 sts pm k across back pm pick up and k12 14 14 16 18 20 20 20 20 sts from the rs along the side of the right shoulder pick up approximately 2 out of every 3 sts pm k across right front r2 p to end slipping m as you go next r is rs see chart below for st counts left left right right
